verses.text: Great \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w worthy|strong="H1121"\w* all praise \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* city \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God. \w His|strong="H7141"\w* holy mountain,

\w that|strong="H3068"\w* rises \w so|strong="H3966"\w* fair, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* world. \w Like|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* gods \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* Zion, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* king.
Once God \w made|strong="H3605"\w* himself known \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* defence \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* palaces.
\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w*! \w A|strong="H3068"\w* concert \w of|strong="H3045"\w* kings passed \w over|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* frontier together.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* glance, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* astounded; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* hastened \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* dismay.

Trembling took hold \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* pains \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w in|strong="H7200"\w* labour.
\w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H3205"\w* shattered, \w as|strong="H8033"\w* east wind shatters \w the|strong="H3205"\w* giant ships \w in|strong="H8033"\w* pieces.

What \w we|strong="H3068"\w* heard, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* now have seen \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* our God. God \w will|strong="H7307"\w* uphold \w her|strong="H7665"\w* forever. \qs Selah\qs*

\w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w think|strong="H7200"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* temple.

\w Your|strong="H7130"\w* fame, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* name, \w shall|strong="H2617"\w* extend \w to|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* ends \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth. Victory fills \w your|strong="H7130"\w* hand.

\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w mount|strong="H4390"\w* Zion \w be|strong="H8034"\w* glad; \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Judah rejoice \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* judgments.
Walk \w about|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, go \w round|strong="H3063"\w* \w her|strong="H1323"\w*; count \w her|strong="H1323"\w* towers.

\w Set|strong="H5437"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* mind on \w her|strong="H5608"\w* ramparts, consider \w her|strong="H5608"\w* palaces; that \w you|strong="H6726"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* next generation

\w That|strong="H4616"\w* such \w is|strong="H3820"\w* God, \w our|strong="H7896"\w* God \w he|strong="H3820"\w* \w it|strong="H7896"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* who \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* guide \w us|strong="H4616"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* ever \w and|strong="H3820"\w* ever.
